ErrorMentionText: If you believe this may be in error, please @mention okuRaku#1417
FishNotInLog: This fish apparently does not appear in the in-game Fish Guide. Therefore, sadly, no other details are available.
IntervalLong: has a window less than a day away...
IntervalMedium: has a window less than four hours away...
IntervalShort: has a window less than an hour away...
IntervalImminent: has a window that is imminent...

windows.description: Get upcoming windows for a fish. Conditions come from players like you via Allagan Reports.
windows.number_of_windows: How many upcoming windows to show.  Minimum 1, maximum 20.  Default 5.
windows.display_duration: Display window durations, useful on fish where it can vary.  Default false.
windows.display_downtime: Display downtime between windows, varies due to weather randomness.  Default true.

bitetimes.description: Bite timings for a spot.  Data from FFXIV Teamcraft.  Box plot by default, optionally histogram

fishguide.description: Fish data from the game as well as player reports and analysis. (XIVAPI, Allagan Reports, Lodinn)
fishguide.fruity_guide: In this optional mode, only the Fruity Snacks video guide will be retrieved.
fishguide.spoiler: In this optional mode, text fields will be marked as spoilers

weather.description: Weather predictions or rate visualization for comparison.
weather.region: Skywatcher region to predict. Ignored if zones are specified.

notify.description: Send messages in this channel when selected fish have windows coming up.
notify.role: (Optional) If specified, this role will be mentioned in the notification.
